title: [SKIN BUG] Gothic Orianna - Head poking thru skin neck thing
body:
So i just played ori and saw that her head pokes thru the thing around her neck when she is walking. It's a little thing but it looks really funny looking and hopefully can be fixed :).

Proof: http://gyazo.com/e8e399191e4bda1a70b5f9571f4a99ef

replies.body:
Hey DJ x! 

Thanks for the awesome bug report (.gifs are super helpful)!

We're hoping to have this resolved next patch. :]

Yo DJ x!

Thanks for the report, I'll be looking into this issue further! Collar pls. ;_;
Are you aware of the visual bug of Warrior Princess Sivir's boomerang going through her arm for her walking animation? Thanks! And sorry I don't know how to create a gif of this.
